overview: With the hot pool guy out on the back deck, Roman Todd and Jordan Boss decide to put on a show to see if he's interested in watching. Personal trainer Chris Blades motivates his lazy client Dante Martin with a different type of cardio. Mikey Junior encourages his buddy Gabriel Cross takes a break from organizing his grandfather's storage unit. Scott DeMarco helps rookie team member Tobias loosen up during a workout after practice.
title: Bareback Packin'
